meanings.definition: A univalent hydrocarbon radical, C9H19, derived from nonane.
meanings.sent1: The chemist studied the structure of the nonyl in the compound.
meanings.sent2: The nonyl group is commonly found in many organic molecules.
meanings.sent3: The nonyl decided to join the carbon party because it felt lonely.
meanings.sent4: The nonyl stood out in the chemical reaction like a bright star in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The nonyl's presence in the molecule was as noticeable as a neon sign in the dark.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a nonyl radical.
meanings.sent1: She conducted an experiment to analyze the nonyl properties of the compound.
meanings.sent2: The nonyl characteristics of the substance were crucial for the research.
meanings.sent3: The nonyl joke made everyone laugh at the chemistry convention.
meanings.sent4: Her nonyl personality shone through in every aspect of her work.
meanings.sent5: The nonyl nature of the material was as distinct as a zebra's stripes.
